= Git config options =
The options form a dictionary. A subset of them is listed here:
`[user]`
    `name` - the full name
    `email`
`[core]`
    `editor` - the program to be used when writing commit msgs etc.
`[init]` 
    `defaultbranch` - the name of the default branch, _master_ by default
`[alias]`
    here you cann add various aliases
